summary: A mod, my first mod, a recreation of my brothers character into the skyrim world as a follower. He can be found in acadias cauldron in whiterun.
descriptionHtml: My brother plays Skyrim on the ps3 and does not get to enjoy modding. So I thought I would make a little something to cheer him up when he saw all my mods and got disappointed, he is 20 and has several mental illnesses so he has difficulty playing on the ps3 as it is. But this is his character and its pretty...plain. I gave him his favorite armor and weapon and it really made him happy. After a while i figured I\'d upload it...
author: dimikschorez
